title: OEDP Dataset Annotation Schema
description: Describes fields for the Dataset Annotation Schema in the OEDP for each single Labeler and Annotation Tool used

id.description: Unique ID for the annotation(formatted as a UUID)

datapoints.description: Number of the data points annotated within a dataset using certain annotation approach

type.description: The type of annotation (internal, outsourced, crowdsourced, synthetic, data programming)

labeler.description: A reference to the Labeler.json schema, specifying the entity responsible for the annotation

tools.description: Tools used for the model's data annotation
